metadata.title: CVE-2018-20024 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
LibVNC before commit 4a21bbd097ef7c44bb000c3bd0907f96a10e4ce7 contains nullpointer dereference in VNC client code that can result DoS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncserver-config - 0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libvncserver0 - 0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
linuxvnc - 0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4').
